function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate adaptation to changes in office workplace management","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficiency in risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adapting to community measures and guidelines","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Development of workplace modification risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate assessment of real estate portfolios leading to ineffective workplace modification activities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"In-person interviews may increase the risk of covid-19 transmission if proper safety measures are not followed.","category":"Public health
